messages.text:
Topic	A short nature documentary exploring beautiful natural landscapes, wildlife, and ecosystems.
Audience	General audience interested in nature and relaxation.
Music Theme	Calming ambient nature sounds with soft orchestral undertones.
Video Length	Approximately 30 seconds (short-form documentary style).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, featuring a narrated overview of nature scenes with engaging facts.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	One professional adult narrator avatar (neutral appearance, suitable for documentary style).
Voice	Adult voice with a calm, neutral accent matching the avatar.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of serene nature scenes like forests, oceans, and wildlife.
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
